metadata.dc:author: Marín Fernández, Blanca
Estéban Fernández, Ma Angeles
Montoro Sánchez, Belén
metadata.dc:description: Measuring body temperature is a common practice in the area of care. There are various measuring instruments, ranging from simple glass thermometers to sophisticated electronics that allow measurement in different body sites. This article presents the advantages and disadvantages of different thermometers are currently on the market.
metadata.dc:title: Sistemas de medición de la temperatura corporal.
[Systems of measurement of body temperature].
